titleStmt.title: Antiquities, historical and monumental, of the county of Cornwall [microform] : consisting of several essays on the first inhabitants, druid-superstion, customs, and remains of the most remote antiquity in Britain, and the British Isles, exemplified and proved by monuments now extant in Cornwall and the Scilly Islands ; with a vocabulary of the Cornu-British language / By William Borlase ...

publicationStmt.authority: Leopoldo Cicognara Program (University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign)
